885:2: ye jinapūrvakāye bhavanti ye ca dhriyanti daśadiśi loke|
885:3: tān hi jināṃśca karomi praṇāmaṃ taṃ jinasaṃghamahaṃ prabhijaṣye|| 1||
885:33: sūkṣmarajopama ye ca bhavanti sūkṣmarajopama ye tiṣṭhanti|| 16||
885:34: tāṃśca jinān prakaromi praṇāmaṃ kāyena vācā manasā prasannā|
885:37: ye ca sunirvṛtasādhujinānāṃ sā ca lalāṭa vicitra anekaiḥ|| 18||
885:38: ekajinasya guṇān nahi śakyo jihvasahasreṇa bhāṣitu kiṃcit|
885:39: kāmamaśakti hi sarvajinānāṃ ekaguṇasya hi vistaravaktum|| 19||
885:41: ye jalagrahaṇatu śakyapramāṇaṃ naiva tu ekaguṇā sugatāntam|| 20||
885:43: prameya saṃcita puṇyaphalāgraṃ tena ca sattva prabhotu jinatvam|| 21||
885:44: eva tu viśvaṃ narapatibuddhaṃ eva karomi nṛpaḥpraṇidhānam|
885:45: yatra ca kutra ci mabhyabhaveta jāti anāgata kalpamanantā|| 22||
885:46: īdṛśabherī paśyami svapne īdṛśanādaṃ tatra śṛṇomi|
885:47: īdṛśa jinastuti kamalākareṇa jāti jarāsmara tatra labheyam|| 23||
885:48: buddhaguṇāni anantamatulyaṃ ye'pi ca durlabha kalpasahasram|
885:49: anuśruta ye ca svapnagate'pi teṣu ca deśayi divasagato'pi|| 24||
885:50: duḥkhasamudra vimocayi sattvā pūrayi ṣaḍabhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ|
885:53: saṃmukhapaśyami śākyamunīndraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ hyahu tatra labheyam|| 26||
885:54: yau ima dārakadvau mama putrau kanakendra kanakaprabhāśvarau|
885:55: tau ubhi dāraka tatra labheyaṃ bodhimanuttaravyākaraṇaṃ ca|| 27||
885:56: ye pi ca sattva anekamanantā śaraṇavihīnā vyasanagatāśca|
885:59: kalpa anāgata bodhi careyaṃ yattahu pūrvaṃ koṭi gatāśca|| 29||
885:61: karmasamudra vikīryatu mahyaṃ kleśasamudra vichidyatu mahyam|| 30||
885:62: puṇyasamudraṃ pūryatu mahyaṃ jñānasamudra viśodhyatu mahyam|
885:63: vimalajñāna prabhāsavareṇa kāma prabhā ca bhaviṣyatu mahyam|| 31||
885:64: puṇyaprabhāsa vilocanatā ca sarvatriloki viśiṣṭa bhaveyam|
885:65: puṇyavareṇa samanvita nityaṃ duḥkhasamudra uttārayitā ca|| 32||
885:66: sarvasukhasya ca sāgarakalpaṃ kalpamanāgata bodhi careyam|
